data.text: Of course you have to make sure you photograph the writhing, before someone comes along with a viper and erases it.

I was led down this path by a typo - "a writing snake", when I meant "writhing". Surprised it's not more popular; toss a snake into a sandpit and read the "automatic writ[h]ing" it leaves behind. Nice resonances of the Delphic Sybil and snake-charming.
